Full Script (energetic tone):

**Intro (0–10 s)**
[Upbeat music] "Hey DIY heroes! Meet the Universal Car Mount – your new side‑kick for every road‑trip adventure. Secure, quick‑install, and ready to roll!"

"Press the suction cup firmly onto the surface. Hear that *click*? That’s the double‑lock engaging. Pull the release lever to test—if it holds, you’re good to go!"

"Slide the arm into the base, then swivel 360° to find the perfect angle. Tighten the knob with one hand—boom, you’ve got a fully adjustable view."

"Place your phone or tablet on the cradle, snap the lock, and adjust the tilt. Fits devices 4‑7 inches, so everything from navigation to podcasts stays perfect."

**Test & tips (130–155 s)**
"Give it a gentle shake—if it stays put, you’ve nailed it! Pro tip: avoid direct sunlight on the suction cup for the first hour; it helps the adhesive set strong."
